entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
